catalog_info.title: Reading Italian
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors. May not be used to fulfill the language requirement. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Some previous study of a Romance language helpful but not necessary. Fluency in English required.
catalog_info.description: For students (both undergraduate and graduate) with little or no knowledge of Italian. Aims at the rapid development of reading skills as a tool for research. Selections of materials in accordance with the needs of the participants.
